description: Program Grant Agreement between The Global Fund To Fight AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS and MALARIA ("Global Fund") and the UNDP ("Principal Recipient")

subproject.description:
Establish mechanisms for collaboration between TB and HIV/AIDS programmes

Decrease the burden of TB in people living with HIV and AIDS (PLWHA)

Decrease the burden of HIV/AIDS in TB patients
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Global fund TB & HIV

title: Tuberculosis and HIV/AIDS Collaborative Programme in Sou
